overview_of_class: An introduction to the culture and sociopolitical issues of contemporary Spain in the basis for review of some problematic grammatical patterns and for skill-building in Spanish.
name: Language in Context: Contemporary Spain
title: WCAS SPANISH 199-0-22 Language in Context: Contemporary Spain

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An introduction to the culture and sociopolitical issues of contemporary Spain in the basis for review of some problematic grammatical patterns and for skill-building in Spanish.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Three class meetings a week
Prerequisite: 121-3, 125-0, AP score of 4 on the Spanish Language and/or Literature, or departmental Spanish Language Placement Exam

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: SPANISH
